BéninRestoo est une start-up installée à Cotonou (Bénin) qui vous
vous aide à commander et à vous faire livrer à domicile, au bureau, peu importe votre position géographique des plats provenant des meilleurs restaurants !

CIBOUSCAN: Scan Your BEAUTY & FOOD Products – Health Score, Nutri-Score, NOVA and Recipes

CIBOUSCAN is the must-have app to take care of your health, your skin and the planet.
Scan your beauty products and groceries in seconds to see their full ingredients, health score, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, and find better alternatives that suit you.

Beauty: your bathroom under control
	•	Scan your cosmetics (skincare, body care, hair care, makeup, perfume).
	•	Get a complete health score for each product: ingredients list, controversial additives, potential impact on your health.
	•	Check the compatibility with your skin type, specific needs or allergies.
	•	Read real user reviews to choose wisely before buying.
	•	Create your personalized beauty routine and get a routine score to track and improve your habits every day.

Food: scan, decode, cook
	•	Scan your food products to see their Nutri-Score, NOVA, and any additives.
	•	Discover personalized recipes based on your food preferences, favorite or blacklisted products, allergies, diet and the season.
	•	Easily view your scan history to track your consumption over time.
	•	Get smart flexitarian recommendations designed to reduce your environmental impact while eating deliciously.

Practical, complete and privacy-friendly
	•	No account required: use all features completely anonymously.
	•	Works with and syncs automatically to the CIBOULETTE app if you already have it.
	•	One smart assistant for your beauty choices, grocery shopping, Nutri-Score and NOVA – all in one app.

Why choose CIBOUSCAN?
	•	One app to scan both BEAUTY and FOOD products.
	•	Access to health scores, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, skin compatibility.
	•	Real user reviews to help you compare and decide.
	•	Personalized recipes for healthy eating without frustration.
	•	A flexible and kind approach: better choices without forbidding what you love.
	•	Everything is anonymous, practical and made for you.

Download CIBOUSCAN now and join the CIBOULETTE team to shop smarter, eat better and take care of yourself and the planet.

** CibouScan is not affiliated with any other apps

Try Premium:

Upgrade to Premium for an ad-free experience. Subscriptions are billed to your Apple account and auto-renew unless turned off in App Store settings. Any unused portion of the free trial is forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.

- PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION -

Premium gives access to all the features of the application!

The subscription will be billed in a single payment. Payment is made through iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
The subscription will renew automatically within 24 hours before the end of the subscription. Your account will be debited 24 hours before your existing subscription ends, at the same price you paid the first time.
You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by receiving you in your account settings after purchase.
If you pay for your subscription before the trial period expires, the remaining free trial period will be forfeited.

IVOIRE ATTIÉKÉ est votre application mobile tout-en-un au Togo, conçue pour vous simplifier la vie au quotidien.

Commande de repas en ligne
Envie d’un bon attiéké poisson ? Commandez votre attiéké préféré en quelques clics, et faites-vous livrer où que vous soyez. Nos restaurants vous proposent le meilleur attiéké de la capitale.

Livraison de colis
Besoin d’envoyer un colis rapidement et en toute sécurité ? IVOIRE ATTIÉKÉ vous propose un service de livraison express pour vos documents, colis ou courses, avec un suivi en temps réel.

Service de taxi
Déplacez-vous facilement grâce à notre service de transport fiable et accessible. Que ce soit pour vos courses quotidiennes, vos rendez-vous ou vos déplacements professionnels, un chauffeur est toujours à proximité.

Téléchargez l'application IVOIRE ATTIÉKÉ dès maintenant et profitez d’un service rapide, simple et adapté à vos besoins, partout au Togo.

Choisissez parmi une large sélection de produits telles que :  Les fruits, les légumes, La viande, le poisson, les céréales, les épices, produits laitiers, amuse-bouche, biscuits et beaucoup plus. Sélectionné les aliments de votre choix en les ajoutant au panier. 

 

Recharger votre portefeuille en quelques seconde avec les méthodes de paiement mobile puis valider votre commande en une touche. Un acheteur faible fera l’achat et la livraison pour vous.  

 

Vous avez même la possibilité de rester en contact avec votre acheteur fiable via notre service de messagerie instantané.  

 

Tous les produits sont au prix du marché car nous ne rajoutons pas de marge sur les produits. Les frais de retrait, de livraison et de service varient en fonction de de votre lieu de livraison mais reste très abordables.

Savourez vos plats préférés en toute simplicité ! 
Notre application vous permet de commander en quelques minutes vos repas favoris auprès des meilleurs restaurants de votre ville. Que vous soyez chez vous, au bureau ou en déplacement, profitez d’une livraison rapide et fiable.

Pourquoi choisir notre application ?
● Large choix de restaurants : Accédez à une grande variété de cuisines.
● Commandes faciles : Interface intuitive pour une expérience fluide.
● Paiement sécurisé : Plusieurs options de paiement pour plus de confort.
● Suivi en temps réel : Suivez votre commande jusqu'à votre porte.
● Offres exclusives : Profitez de réductions et de promotions régulières.

Comment ça marche ?
1- Téléchargez l'application et créez votre compte.
2- Choisissez votre restaurant et votre plat.
3- Passez commande et suivez la livraison en direct.
4- Recevez votre repas et dégustez !

Simplifiez vos repas dès aujourd’hui. Téléchargez l’application et commandez ! 

Conditions d'utilisation: https://mac-eats.net/conditions-generales-utilisation/

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Order meals and snacks from your favourite local and national restaurants, or get groceries, essentials and alcohol delivered to your door.
New users get 30% off your first 3 orders. T&C apply: New users only. Expires 30 days from new user’s first DoorDash order. Valid at participating stores only. 1 redemption per user for each category; national chain, local and grocery (3 in total). Max $20 discount per order. Fees apply.
YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Explore a wide variety of cuisines and get your meals faster with quick and easy ordering. From your local noodle place to your daily coffee fix to your go-to comfort food, find your favourites on DoorDash. National partners include McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Hungry Jack's, Subway, Domino's, KFC, Subway, Taco Bell, Nando's, Oporto, Grill'd, Sushi Sushi, Zambrero and more.
GROCERIES AND CONVENIENCE
Order from your local Coles, IGA or 7-Eleven and have thousands of items delivered when you need them. Top up the pantry, grab last-minute ingredients, stock up on snacks to share with mates or cool down with a slurpee. Get your groceries and everyday essentials delivered with DoorDash.
SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS AND SAVE
With a DashPass subscription, enjoy unlimited deliveries and pay $0 delivery fees at DashPass merchants (min. spend applies), plus get access to special offers from local restaurants.
DELIVERY OR PICKUP?
Get what you need straight to your door, schedule delivery for when it's most convenient for you, or order ahead with pickup for a fast and easy takeaway.
NO-CONTACT DELIVERY
Deliveries are left at your door, unless you choose "Hand it to me" when ordering. For contactless deliveries, your Dasher will leave your food in a safe place and let you know it's ready.
TRACK YOUR ORDER
Real-time tracking lets you see when your order will arrive. We've factored in food prep and handling times, traffic, weather and more so you'll know exactly when to set the table.
CONVENIENT PAYMENT
Pay with Apple Pay, credit or debit card, PayPal or Afterpay.
ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. Since 2013, we've been building products and services to empower local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live.

Get Arabesque Kitchen+ today!

InVintory: The #1 Wine Collection Platform

Discover, organize, and enjoy your wine collection like never before. InVintory is the #1 wine app for collectors, built on a sommelier-curated database of over 2 million wines. Powered by smart AI recommendations and immersive 3D cellar visualization, it’s the easiest and most accurate way to manage your wines.

[ SOMMELIER-CURATED DATABASE ]

Access the world’s most accurate wine database curated by sommeliers, not crowdsourced or sponsored data. Every bottle in your collection deserves verified details from a library of over 2 million wines.

[ YOUR CELLAR IN 3D ]

Bring your collection to life with VinLocate, a stunning 3D replica of your cellar or wine fridge. Assign bottles to exact slots, find them instantly, and experience your collection visually.

[ ADD, IMPORT & ORGANIZE ]

Add bottles by scanning labels, searching our verified database, or importing from CellarTracker, Vivino, or spreadsheets. Your entire cellar stays organized, searchable, and synced automatically.

[ AI SOMMELIER RECOMMENDATIONS ]

Meet your personal wine expert. Ask your AI Sommelier anything about wine, from food pairings and serving temperature to investment insights and personalized recommendations based on what you own.

[ SAVED LISTS & QUICK FILTERS ]

Create Saved Lists for events, tastings, or personal goals. Use Quick Filters to instantly access your ready-to-drink bottles, favorite varietals, regions, or vintage years.

[ DISCOVER NEW WINES ]

Find your next favorite bottle with advanced search and smart filters for varietal, region, and drink window. Explore expert reviews and collector insights to make confident choices.

[ CELLARSTICKERS™ (PREMIUM) ]

Label your bottles with CellarStickers™, NFC-enabled tags that let you tap any bottle to view its full details instantly. Perfect for collectors, restaurants, and storage facilities.

[ REAL-TIME VALUE TRACKER ]

Track your collection’s total worth and monitor live market prices, trends, and purchase history with professional-grade analytics.

[ OPTIMAL DRINK WINDOWS ]

Get notified when your wines reach peak maturity so you can enjoy them at the perfect time.

[ DELIVERY & INVENTORY MANAGEMENT ]

Track shipments, print barcode labels, batch-edit bottles, and export PDF or spreadsheet reports for insurance, investment, or record keeping.

[ PROTECT YOUR COLLECTION ]

Connect Govee sensors to monitor temperature and humidity, and back up your collection securely in the cloud.

[ JOIN THE COMMUNITY ]

Share tasting notes, manage wine clubs, and connect with fellow collectors in a vibrant global community.

[ SYNC ACROSS DEVICES ]

Your wine collection stays automatically synced across iPhone, iPad, and desktop.

[ UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES ]

Upgrade to unlock VinLocate 3D, CellarStickers, AI Sommelier, advanced analytics, and unlimited storage. Essential features are free forever.

Download InVintory today and take the guesswork out of collecting.

Terms of Use: https://invintory.com/terms-conditions
Website: https://invintory.com
Desktop App: https://app.invintory.com

Nous mettons à votre disposition une liste de restaurants à découvrir le tout dans votre téléphone mobile.

FOODO vous permet de choisir parmi certains restaurants de la place votre petit-déjeuner, votre déjeuner ou même votre diné. . Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

Explore the world of baking with our Cake Recipes Offline app, a comprehensive guide to creating mouthwatering cakes. Whether you're a seasoned baker or just starting, our app offers a diverse collection of cake recipes to satisfy your sweet cravings. Access a variety of cake categories, from classic favorites to innovative creations, even without an internet connection!

Key Features:
Offline Access: No internet? No problem! Access a wide range of cake recipes anytime, anywhere.
Extensive Collection: Discover 17 categories, including Apple Cake, Banana Cake, Red Velvet Cake, and more.
Celebration Specials: Find recipes for every occasion, from Birthday Cake to Wedding-worthy creations.
Fresh Ingredients: Dive into recipes featuring seasonal fruits like Peach Cake, Strawberry Cake, and Zucchini Cake.
Homemade Delights: Master the art of baking with step-by-step instructions for Homemade Cake, Cupcake, and more.
Chocolate Lover's Paradise: Explore rich options with our Chocolate Cake and Bundt Cake recipes.
Party-Ready Sheet Cakes: Impress guests with stunning Sheet Cake creations, perfect for gatherings.
Favorites: Save your go-to recipes in the Favorites section for quick access.
Cooking Videos: Watch step-by-step cooking videos for visual guidance and inspiration.
Whole Recipe Search: Easily find specific recipes using our comprehensive search feature.

Why Choose Cake Recipes Offline?
No Internet Required: Access recipes anytime, even in areas with limited connectivity.
Easy Navigation: Find your favorite recipes quickly with user-friendly category filters.
Save and Share: Bookmark recipes and share them with fellow baking enthusiasts.
Time-Tested Recipes: Enjoy a curated collection of tried-and-true recipes for perfect cakes every time.

Unlock the joy of baking with Cake Recipes Offline – your passport to a world of sweet, homemade delights. Download now and embark on a culinary journey that's as satisfying as the first bite of a freshly baked cake!

Cook smarter with Eat'Easy!

Eat'Easy is your ultimate kitchen companion. Whether you're planning meals, managing your pantry or discovering new recipes, Eat'Easy makes it easy.

Features:

Add ingredients: Quickly add ingredients from your kitchen to your inventory and keep track of what you have.

Generate recipes: Get personalized recipe suggestions tailored to the ingredients you already have. No more last-minute shopping!

Scan receipts: Save time by uploading your receipts. Items are automatically added to your inventory, helping you stay organized.

Nutrition tracking: Keep an eye on the calorie count for each meal. Make healthier choices with ease.

Save and share recipes: Save your favorite recipes and share them with friends and family in just a few clicks.

Make cooking a stress-free experience, reduce food waste and enjoy delicious meals with Eat'Easy.

Download Eat'Easy today and transform the way you cook!

At iKooK, we believe food is more than just a meal—it’s a story, a connection, and a moment to remember. That’s why we’ve created a platform where chefs and food lovers come together to share these incredible experiences.


Whether planning an intimate dinner, a big wedding celebration, or simply needing help with meal prep for your busy schedule, iKooK makes it easy to find the perfect chef to bring your vision to life.



Why Choose iKooK?

- We’re not just about food; we’re about the people behind it. iKooK celebrates chefs—whether seasoned professionals or rising stars—giving them a space to shine while clients enjoy amazing, personalized meals.
- Our platform helps you book affordable private chefs in Nigeria, the UK, and South Africa. We cater to your unique needs, from creating custom menus to handling dietary preferences, so you can focus on enjoying every bite.



What You’ll Love About iKooK
- Simple Booking: Hiring a chef has always been challenging. Browse, book, and get ready to enjoy!
- Personalized Services: From Christmas feasts to everyday meals, we’ve got you covered.
- Clear Pricing: No hidden fees—just honest rates you can count on.
- Reliable Support: Need help? Our team is here to guide you every step of the way.
- Chef Tracking: Stay updated on your booking so everything goes smoothly.
For Chefs, By Chefs

If you’re a chef, iKooK is your stage! Create a personalized profile, showcase your menus, and connect with clients who appreciate your talent. We make it easy for you to manage bookings and build your brand while doing what you love.

With iKooK, every meal is an opportunity to create something memorable for chefs and clients.

Seeya - A tantalizing journey around the globe

Embark on a tantalizing journey around the globe with Seeya, the ultimate app for food enthusiasts and culinary adventurers. Whether you’re a curious gourmand or simply someone who loves good food, Seeya is designed to inspire your culinary creativity and enhance your dining experiences.

Key Features:

Explore International Food Cultures: Delve into the rich tapestry of global cuisine! Seeya offers an immersive experience that highlights diverse food cultures from every corner of the world.Discover the traditions, stories, and ingredients that make each dish unique.

AI-Powered Food Recommendations: Feeling adventurous? Let our intelligent AI randomly suggest a dish for you to try, based on your preferences and dietary restrictions.

Gourmet and Chef Recipes: Unlock the secrets of gourmet cooking with our extensive library of chef-curated recipes.

Voice Party Room: Join a community of foodies and connect with fellow enthusiasts who share your passion for cooking. Engage in lively discussions about your favorite dishes, exchange tips, and forge new friendships centered around the love of food.

AI Assistant: Our AI assistant is always available to help you with any food-related questions or concerns. Need help with meal planning, recipe suggestions, or cooking techniques? We've got you covered!

Download Seeya now and start enjoying a more personalized, social, and exciting culinary

Discover Japanese Food & Anime Dishes: The Ultimate Cookbook App.

Discover Japanese food like never before with the ultimate anime-inspired cookbook app. Perfect for fans of cooking, anime, Japanese culture, and anyone who loves ramen recipes, sushi recipes, and authentic Japanese recipes made simple.

Whether you enjoy classics from Tokyo street food or want to recreate iconic meals seen in your favorite anime series, this app is your complete Japanese cooking companion.
From cozy bowls of miso ramen to colorful bento boxes and adorable anime-style desserts, every recipe is designed to be easy, quick, delicious, and fun.
Anime Food You Have Always Wanted to Cook
Recreate dishes inspired by the most beloved anime worlds. In this cookbook you will find meals reminiscent of popular series such as:
•	Adventures with comforting broths like shoyu ramen, tonkotsu ramen, and spicy miso bowls.
•	Heartwarming dishes like rice bowls, katsudon, gyudon, curry rice, and fluffy Japanese omelettes.
•	Bento-style meals packed with snacks, tamagoyaki, karaage chicken, and onigiri.
•	Cute and colorful anime desserts, taiyaki, dango, and matcha sweets.
If you have ever wanted to cook the foods you have seen in slice-of-life anime, fantasy anime, school-life shows, samurai classics, or modern shonen favorites this app brings them to your kitchen.
The Best Japanese Recipes (Beginner-Friendly)
Search, cook, and enjoy a growing collection of:

Tous les jours c'est la même question qui revient: « on mange quoi ce soir »/ Avec l’appli Cuisine Actuelle la question ne se pose plus, trouvez la recette de cuisine qui vous plait. Que vous aimiez la cuisine gastronomique, la cuisine saine / vegan, ou bien la cuisine simple avec une recette facile et rapide à réaliser, notre application est faite pour vous.

Cuisine Actuelle, c’est des nouvelles idées recettes chaque jour, des conseils de préparation pour ne plus rater votre cuisson, des suggestions en fonction de ce qu’il y a dans votre frigo, ou encore des listes de courses pour cuisiner les plats qui vous donnent envie…

•        RECETTES 
Retrouvez des milliers d'idées recette avec la possibilité de sauvegarder vos coups de cœur, d’ajouter les ingrédients nécessaires à leur réalisation à votre liste de courses, et bien sûr nos conseils pour un menu réussi !

•        MON FRIGO
Dans cette rubrique, cochez les ingrédients présents dans votre frigo (viandes, légumes, poissons, fromages…) et on vous proposera un échantillon de recettes faites à partir de ces mêmes ingrédients. De quoi vous inspirer de délicieuses recettes digne d'un grand marmiton !

•        FAVORIS
Ici, retrouvez toutes vos idées recettes sauvegardées pour les réaliser plus tard…ou tout simplement vous mettre l’eau à la bouche !

•        LISTE DE COURSES
Une quiche vous a tapé dans l’œil mais il vous manque les œufs nécessaires à sa préparation ? Aucun souci, à partir de la recette, cochez les ingrédients qu’il vous manque et retrouvez-les dans votre liste de courses.

Un veritable livre de cuisine en ligne ? Bien plus que cela ! Maintenant que vous vous faites une idée de notre application, vous n’avez plus d’excuse pour ne pas cuisiner. Alors à vos marques… prêts… à vos marmites !

N’hésitez pas à nous contacter 

Nous améliorons l’application Cuisine Actuelle régulièrement afin de répondre à vos attentes et vous proposer un service toujours plus performant. Pour toute remarque ou suggestion d’amélioration, n’hésitez pas à nous contacter à l’adresse suivante : savmobile@prismamedia.com

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. De l'apprenti cuisinier au chef étoilé, recherchez parmi des milliers de recettes de cuisine illustrées en photo ou en vidéo. Des recettes faciles aux astuces et secrets de chefs, renouvelez vos menus et épatez vos proches.

Découvrez des recettes originales notées, commentées et classées par genre, par ingrédient ou par difficulté. Que vous ayez envie de cuisiner une entrée, un plat ou un dessert pour vous ou vos amis, profitez de l’application Cuisine et de ses recettes variées :
● Petit déjeuner et goûter (brioche, crêpe, pain, brunch…)
● Apéritifs & buffet (amuse gueule, verrine, tartine….)
● Entrée (potage, soupe, terrine...)
● Tartes, quiches, pizzas
● Plats/viandes (poulet, porc, boeuf, agneau...)
● Plats/poissons et fruits de mer (crevettes, saint-jacques, crustacés...)
● Pâtes & riz (risotto, spaghetti, lasagne...)
● Légumes & gratins
● Sauce (béarnaise, béchamel, coulis...)
● Salade
● Dessert (pâtisserie, gâteau, fondant au chocolat...)
● Friandises & biscuits (muffin, cookie, macaron...)
● Cocktail

L’application Cuisine vous propose une cuisine du monde et de nos régions avec des grands classiques mais aussi des recettes originales.

Avec l’application Cuisine vous pourrez :
● Profiter des recettes détaillées étapes par étapes illustrées en photo et vidéos avec de nombreux avis.
● Retrouver un menu du jour composé par nos soins et actualisé quotidiennement pour vous donner des idées de repas.
● Rechercher des recettes par mots clés, ingrédients, types de plat, thèmes et difficultés.
● Retrouver les grands classiques de la cuisine classés par catégorie.
● Ajouter en un clic vos recettes favorites à votre carnet de recettes pour les retrouver facilement dans l’application mais aussi en ligne.
● Donner votre avis sur les différentes recettes proposées dans l’application.
● Recevoir si vous le souhaitez des idées de recettes via les notifications.

L'appli Cuisine, c'est votre livre de recettes personnalisé à portée de poche !

Vous souhaitez nous faire une suggestion, nous signaler un problème ? Contactez-nous par e-mail : iphone@journaldesfemmes.com
